text: When a relationship ends, I notice my emotional response and choose to process it cleanly instead of leaving debris.
During moments after a breakup, I notice any emotional debris and choose to address it instead of letting it linger.
When I feel the pull to hold onto a relationship that's ended, I notice it and choose to detach cleanly instead.
I let emotional debris from breakups prevent me from moving on cleanly and detaching from relationships.
When I notice difficulty moving on, I recognize it and choose to process the breakup fully instead of avoiding it.
I see when I'm leaving emotional debris, and I choose to clean it up and detach fully instead.
When I feel the urge to stay connected to a past relationship, I notice it and choose to let go completely instead.
I let not identifying my breakup style prevent me from ending relationships cleanly and detaching without debris.
When I notice patterns of emotional debris, I recognize them and choose to break the cycle with awareness.
I recognize when breakup struggles come from not processing fully, and I choose to address them directly.
When I feel the pull to avoid processing a breakup, I notice it and choose to face it fully instead.
I let leaving emotional debris prevent me from moving on cleanly and ending relationships with clarity.
When I notice clean detachment happening, I recognize it and choose to maintain that clarity.
I see when I need to process a breakup more fully, and I choose to do the work instead of leaving debris.
When I feel the urge to hold onto past relationships, I notice it and choose to detach completely instead.
I let difficulty moving on prevent me from ending relationships cleanly and detaching without emotional debris.
When I notice clean breakup patterns, I recognize them and choose to strengthen those habits.
I recognize when emotional debris is blocking my ability to move on, and I choose to clear it instead.
When I feel the pull to leave emotional debris, I notice it and choose to process the breakup fully instead.
I let not identifying my breakup style prevent me from ending relationships cleanly and detaching without debris.
